props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Document assumptions made and techniques used in data selection, curation, preparation and analysis

props.name: Rule_Title
props.value: Ensure data source assumptions are documented

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure that any data source used is not in the negative/blocked list of sources in OPRT

props.name: Rule_Title
props.value: Ensure data source is not in negative list

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure that policies regarding data and construct validity, fairness, and bias are documented

props.name: Rule_Title
props.value: Ensure documentation for fairness and bias policies

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure that the data has been cleaned to remove biased content

props.name: Rule_Title
props.value: Ensure data cleaning for fairness and bias

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure that OPRT has approved the data request and appropriate consent or license has been obtained and recorded, if required.

props.name: Rule_Title
props.value: Ensure any data request is approved by OPRT

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure that all data access is controled through appropriate access control mechanisms

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure that PII / propreity data is either encrypted or masked to protect provacy

props.name: Rule_Title
props.value: Ensure privacy of sensistive data is protected

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure model details such as model type  (e.g., convolutional neural network, reinforcement learning, decision tree, random forest, etc.), data features, training algorithms, proposed uses, decision thresholds, training data, evaluation data, and ethical considerations are documented.

props.name: Rule_Title
props.value: Ensure AI model details are documented

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value:
Ensure that the following aspects of Model's lifecycle are documented:
- model version
- model's lifecycle state change/roadmap with timeframe (deprecation, end of support)
- model replacement (including the functional differences, benchmarking results)
- runtime definition required to host the model
- runtime version
- runtime lifecycle state change/updates with timeframe/roadmap

props.name: Rule_Title
props.value: Ensure AI model lifecycle aspects are documented

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure regular monitoring of AI model to track its performance and trustworthiness.

props.name: Rule_Title
props.value: Ensure process are in place to track AI model performance

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure regular monitoring to detect model drift and processes to mitigate drift.

props.name: Rule_Title
props.value: Ensure model drift is tracked and mitigated

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure AI system capabiltiies, limitations, and accetable usages are documented and reported - list AI system capabilities, list AI system limitations, list instructions for AI system usage, list architectural diagrams.

props.name: Rule_Title
props.value: Ensure AI system capabiltiies, limitations, and accetable usages are documented

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure technical documentation and instructions for usage of AI models.

props.name: Rule_Title
props.value: Ensure technical documentation on usage of AI system

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure evaluations for safety, security, bias, explainability of AI applications are conducted and documented / reported.

props.name: Rule_Title
props.value: Ensure trustworthy AI efforts are documented

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure that the AI system does not disproportionately favor or discriminate against certain individuals or groups based on protected characteristics. Use fairness metrics and statistical techniques to evaluate and mitigate biases.

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure that the AI system's algorithms and decision-making processes are transparent. Provide explanations or visualizations that enable users and stakeholders to understand how the system arrived at its outputs.

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure secure development practices for generative AI applications are defined and deployed throughout the AI lifecycle for cybersecurity, physical security and insider threats.

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure testing measures, including  testing throughout the AI life cycle are deployed and results reported.

props.name: Rule_Title
props.value: Ensure testing AI system for trustworthiness

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure AI systems are designed and implemented with robustness, so that they can withstand various types of failures, attacks, and unexpected inputs

props.name: Rule_Title
props.value: Ensure implementation of resilient AI system

control-implementations.description: NIST AI RMF Gen AI controls
